sources.title: Captured in Chinatown (1935) Crime, Mystery, Romance | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Tarzan, the great dog star, leads the police in their fearless attacks against organized crime!
A feud between two gangs in Chinatown breaks out into a tong war.

Director: Elmer Clifton
Writers: George Arthur Durlam, Elmer Clifton
Stars: Tarzan the Police Dog, Marion Shilling, Charles Delaney 
Genres: Crime, Mystery, Romance, Sport

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Ann Parker and Bob Martin, reporters on the Daily CHronicle, go to Chinatown to get a story on the wedding that is supposed to bring an end to a long-standing feud between warring Chinese Tongs. The theft of a wedding-present necklace starts the feud anew. Ann and Bob are drawn into the dangerous situation but Tarzan, Famous Police Dog, is a vital factor in solving the mystery which results in a final victory over the real criminals and restoration and goodwill between the warring clans.
